scenario: In 2024, Bob has wages of $77,138.77. Bob also has an interest in a passive activity which generated a loss of $43,327.94 for the year. Bob has passive income from another source of $7,038.71.
question: Calculate the amount of the passive activity loss that is deductible in 2024 under I.R.C. § 469(a).
answer_explanation: Passive losses are limited to passive income. With $7,038.71 in passive income, only $7,038.71 of the $43,327.94 loss is deductible.
reasoning: Limited passive loss to passive income.
